jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Responsible for communications and educational plan and message crafting, including all communication channel management to ensure that all merchant related information is communicated and delivered effectively to merchants:  

● Strategize social media communication to increase merchant engagement, performance, and GoFood branding 
● Analyze merchants' needs for the team to create educational material and communication to help different tools adoptions  
● Able to analyze effective communication channels for different tiers of merchants  
● Ensure participation of campaign through online communication channels  
● Make a report and analyze the effectiveness of different communication channels  
● Expert in doing effective digital marketing (such as ads)

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
